sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
strictly for a particular thing or person
, se tisto sme uporabljati ali narediti samo za določen namen ali osebo oziroma tisto sme narediti izključno ta oseba.

seg.quote: The discussion was strictly for members.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
strictly speaking
popravimo ali dopolnimo nekaj, kar smo rekli prej.

seg.quote: Paul's a friend of mine. Well, strictly speaking my sister's friend.
